description: Police say a girl who was found unwell in a house died a short time later in hospital.
title: Police continue to investigate death of girl
title_page: Llangunnor child death: Police continue to investigate death of girl - BBC News
maintext:
Police continue to investigate the death of a child after a 41-year-old woman was arrested.
Officers were called by the Welsh Ambulance Service to an address in Llangunnor, Camarthenshire, at about 18:00 GMT on 20 February.
Police said a four-year-old girl was found to be "unwell" at the property and was taken to hospital where she died a short time later.
A woman was arrested on suspicion of gross negligence manslaughter, and has been released on bail, Dyfed-Powys Police said.
